\newcommand{\ottstmt}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{id}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{exp}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{while} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{\}}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{\ottmv{m}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}}

\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{endian}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{bop} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{cast\_kind}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{id} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{if} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{then} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{extract} \, \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottdrulevarXXextend}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{var}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{var}  \neq  \ottnt{var'}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{var'}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{v'}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{var}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}}{%
{\ottdrulename{var\_extend}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarXXreduce}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{var}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{var}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}}{%
{\ottdrulename{var\_reduce}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarXXunknown}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{[]}  \vdash  \ottmv{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{type}  \leadsto  \ottkw{unknown} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{str}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{type}}{%
{\ottdrulename{var\_unknown}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{word}  \leadsto  \ottnt{word}}{%
{\ottdrulename{int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXaddr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leadsto  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_addr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXbyte}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leftarrow  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leadsto  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_byte}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXmem}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \neq  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leadsto  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_mem}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXunXXmem}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottkw{unknown} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{str}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \leadsto  \ottkw{unknown} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{str}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_un\_mem}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{var}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{var}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXunXXaddr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{unknown} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{str}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leftarrow  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leadsto  \ottkw{unknown} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{str}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{reg\_}  \ottsym{8}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_un\_addr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXbyteXXrec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8} \, \ottsym{<} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \leadsto  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_byte\_rec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXwordXXbe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{be}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{be}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{succ} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{be}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{size}  \ottsym{-}  \ottsym{8}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_word\_be}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleloadXXwordXXel}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{succ} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{size}  \ottsym{-}  \ottsym{8}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{8}}{%
{\ottdrulename{load\_word\_el}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestoreXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{with} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ed}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{size}  \leftarrow  \ottnt{v}}{%
{\ottdrulename{store\_val}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexp}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{exp}  \leadsto  \ottnt{exp'}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarXXextend{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarXXreduce{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarXXunknown{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXaddr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXbyte{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXmem{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXunXXmem{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXunXXaddr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXbyteXXrec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXwordXXbe{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleloadXXwordXXel{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestoreXXval{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsreduce}{
\ottdefnexp{}}

\ottdefnsreduce
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
